p: All experimental biomasses, including callus, suspension and bioreactor cultures, were maintained in a phytotron at 23 ± 1 °C, with a light intensity of 88 ± 8 mol × m −2 × s −1 (Philips-Flora-TLD 35W/33 fluorescent lamps, Philips, France). The length of the day and night—photoperiod (cyclical lighting—17/24 h) was regulated using an electric system.
